q1_orthogonality.interpretation: 100% of rebalances have 0/2 holding overlap. Selection layer fully orthogonal.

primary_metrics.interpretation: In market crashes, at least one leg survives 70% of the time. CI95 upper 0.519 within 0.65 threshold.

beta_neutral_residual.interpretation: After removing 510300 beta, idiosyncratic residuals still positively correlated (0.50). Likely shared sector/style exposure. Monitor in Shadow.

monitoring_only.co_crash_ratio_note: Inflated by shared A-share market beta. Not used for verdict.
monitoring_only.complementarity_corr_note: Biased negative by OR mask. Measures stress-day complementarity, not joint crash.

verdict_rules.q2_pass: worst_week_overlap <= 2 AND P(both<0|mkt left) <= 0.50 AND Wilson CI95 upper <= 0.65
